bump().details: Expects to succeed; reverts if the floor tick doesn't move.

configureDependencies().details: This function will be called when the `executor` installs the MarketMaking         policy in the Baseline-V2 `Kernel`.

getCirculatingSupply().details: There are rounding errors here due to using LiquidityAmounts         Should round downwards, which overestimates supply (safe).

getRebalanceTicks().details: This ensures that the majority of our liquidity is composed of reserves         when we rebalance liquidity.         This primarily affects `sweep()`.

getTotalCapacity().details: Not precise, but rounds in our favor (safe).

DISCOVERY_WIDTH().notice: how wide the discovery liquidity range is (in TICK_SPACINGS)

EMISSIONS_DISTRIBUTOR().notice: The where all protocol emissions are sent.

INFLATION_RATE().notice: The % of the surplus liquidity taken by the protocol as a fee.

LIQ_THICKNESS().notice: The target depth of the anchor position as a % of total floor liquidity (in basis points)

bump().notice: "bump" the floor position up by one tick spacing if possible.

canSlide().notice: Returns whether or not a pool can slide().

canSweep().notice: Returns whether or not a pool can sweep().

changeKernel(address).notice: Function used by kernel when migrating to a new kernel.

configureDependencies().notice: Default framework setup. Configure dependencies for Baseline modules.

getCirculatingSupply().notice: Returns an estimated circulating supply of bAssets

getCurrentThreshold().notice: Returns the target liquidity depth in the premium ranges

getRebalanceTicks().notice: Returns the safe amount of ticks required to rebalance the pool

getTotalCapacity().notice: Returns the total capacity of the pool

isActive().notice: Easily accessible indicator for if a policy is activated or not.

requestPermissions().notice: Default framework setup. Request permissions for interacting with Baseline modules.

slide().notice: Rebalance when the price of the pool decreases beyond the threshold.

sweep().notice: Rebalance when the price of the pool increases beyond the threshold.

documentation.text:
@notice how wide the discovery liquidity range is (in TICK_SPACINGS)
 @dev    this number is multiplied by BPOOL.TICK_SPACING()

@notice The % of the surplus liquidity taken by the protocol as a fee.
 @dev    Expressed in basis points (i.e. 1000 = 10%).

@notice The target depth of the anchor position as a % of total floor liquidity (in basis points)
 @dev    100 LIQ_THICKNESS = 1% total floor depth
@notice The where all protocol emissions are sent.
@notice The current checkpoint tick
@notice The Uniswap Pool
@notice The reserve asset token contract
@notice the bAsset token contract
@notice convenience variable for tick spacing

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct Permissions memory[] memory)

documentation.text: @notice Default framework setup. Request permissions for interacting with Baseline modules.

@notice "bump" the floor position up by one tick spacing if possible.
 @dev    Expects to succeed; reverts if the floor tick doesn't move.
@notice Returns whether or not a pool can sweep().

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (enum Range) view returns (struct Position memory)
